text: 16.2: FG 20.7; VB 1.10Nde zazera ŋaariveŋ tugɨra tɨgɨv, Sanderir, nde mba ŋaariven ndi ŋkɨɨa, nde nta shɨgɨp, thariveŋ ndi mbur surim, nta nde phenin kɨri. Nde maaŋ muuŋv bisaŋ bisanera ndi surim, mba ŋkɨɨa ŋgɨp vhɨrkɨvgirga. Maaŋ muuŋgip, gu nden han zɨrga, nde mben nɨɨnga ŋkɨɨa suaŋv ganɨnga tuktɨgi fhuvara.
